name: Player Detector
category: 進階電腦週邊設備：週邊設備

pages.text: The Player Detector is able to recognize players within a certain range. In addition, it recognizes the player who clicks on him.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/player_detector/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!

mapping.0: 計算機工藝：進階計算機

pages.text: Connect your Player Detector to a computer to make use of it!
